title: Summerhill (TEFC)
creator_credit: Dennis Miller, Cecily Burwash and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Visits England’s progressive co-educational boarding school, Summerhill, founded by Alexander Neill a half century ago. Aims to show that students can make decisions about their studies without lessening the quality of their education.
creator_credit_for_label: Dennis Miller, Cecily Burwash and ONF | NFB
